title: Fix: Pomodoro timer task becomes unclickable after completion
description:
Bug: After Pomodoro timer completes, the task in the timer interface becomes unclickable. Users must click on the quest card itself to restart the timer, instead of being able to click directly on the task in the timer interface.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Start a Pomodoro timer for a task
2. Wait for timer to complete
3. Try to click on the task in the timer interface
4. Task is unclickable

Expected behavior: Task should remain clickable in the timer interface after completion

Current workaround: Click on the quest card to restart timer
